Warning.SelectType: {name} type must be selected for creation.

MYTHICREALMS.title: Mythic Realms

Global.Hint: These bonuses apply to checks & saves made with any ability.
Global.Label: Global Bonus

Bonuses.Hint: These bonuses apply to checks & saves made with {ability}.
Bonuses.Label: {ability} Bonuses

MYTHICREALMS.AbilityConfigurationHint: Configure ability saving throw proficiency, saving throw bonuses, and check bonuses.
MYTHICREALMS.AbilityCheckGlobalBonusHint: This bonus applies to all ability checks made by this actor.
MYTHICREALMS.ActionWarningNoItem: The requested item {item} no longer exists on Actor {name}
MYTHICREALMS.ActionWarningNoToken: You must have one or more controlled Tokens in order to use this option.

condition.hint: Condition required to activate this activity.
condition.label: Activation Condition

override.hint: Use these activation values instead of the item's when using this activity.
override.label: Override Activation

type.hint: Activation type (e.g. action, legendary action, minutes).
type.label: Activation Cost

value.hint: Scalar value associated with the activation.
value.label: Activation Value

Warning.NoActions: No {type} are available, but activating this requires at least {required}.
Warning.NotEnoughActions: Not enough {type} to activate, {required} required but only {available} available.

MYTHICREALMS.ACTIVEEFFECT.AttributeKeyTooltip: For a list of common keys, see the wiki.

statuses.hint: While affected by this Active Effect, the target will be treated as having these additional status conditions.
statuses.label: Status Conditions

chatFlavor.hint: Additional text displayed in the activation chat message.
chatFlavor.label: Chat Flavor

level.hint: Range of levels required to apply this effect.
level.label: Level Limit

requireAttunement.hint: Activity will not be usable if item requires attunement and isn't attuned.
requireAttunement.label: Require Attunement

requireIdentification.hint: Activity will not be usable if item isn't identified.
requireIdentification.label: Require Identification

requireMagic.hint: Activity will not be usable if magic isn't available.
requireMagic.label: Require Magic

identifier.hint: The identifier of the class that level limits apply to. If left blank, the character level is used.
identifier.label: Class Identifier

level.hint: Range of levels required to use this activity.
level.label: Level Limit

Warning.UsageNotAllowed: Using this activity isn't currently possible.

Warning.CreateActor: You must have 'Create New Actors' permission in order to summon directly from a compendium.
Warning.InvalidItem: {itemType} items cannot be added to a {actorType}.
Warning.NoActor: Actor cannot be found with UUID '{uuid}' to summon.
Warning.Singleton: Only a single {itemType} can be added to a {actorType}.

MYTHICREALMS.ACTIVITY.MYTHICREALMS.ActiveEffectOverrideWarning: This value is being modified by an Active Effect and cannot be edited. Disable the effect to edit it.
MYTHICREALMS.ACTIVITY.MYTHICREALMS.AddEmbeddedItemPromptHint: Do you want to add these items to your character sheet?

Feat.Hint: Drop a feat here to choose one instead of an ability score improvement.

cap.hint: Maximum number of points a player can assign to a single score.
cap.label: Point Cap

fixed.hint: Abilities that are improved by a fixed amount and cannot be manually improved during the process.
fixed.label: Fixed Improvement

max.hint: Increase the maximum score from what is allowed on the actor.
max.label: Maximum

points.hint: Number of points that can be assigned to any unlocked ability score.
points.label: Points

recommendation.hint: Epic Boon feat recommended by this class.
recommendation.label: Recommendation

AbilityScoreImprovement.Hint: Allow the player to increase one or more ability scores or take an optional feat.

Journal.DescriptionEpic: You gain an Epic Boon feat or another feat of your choice for which you qualify.
Journal.DescriptionEpicRecommendation: You gain an Epic Boon feat or another feat of your choice for which you qualify. {recommendation} is recommended.
Journal.DescriptionLegacy:
When you reach {firstLevelOrdinal} level, and again at {otherLevelsOrdinal} level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you canâ€™t increase an ability score above {maxAbilityScore} using this feature.

Using the optional feats rule, you can forgo taking this feature to take a feat of your choice instead.
Journal.DescriptionModern: You gain the Ability Score Improvement feat or another feat of your choice for which you qualify. You gain this feature again at {class} levels {otherLevels}.
Journal.Name: Ability Score Improvement

AbilityScoreImprovement.LockedHint: Scores cannot be modified with a feat selected.
AbilityScoreImprovement.Title: Ability Score Improvement

Warning.Type: Only features with the "feat" type can be selected.

HitPoints.Hint: Track the player's hit points for each level in the class.
HitPoints.Title: Hit Points

Warning.Empty: Hit points must be rolled or the average value must be taken.
Warning.Invalid: Hit points must be a valid whole number.

ItemChoice.DropHint: Drop Items here to add them to the list that can be chosen with this advancement.

allowDrops.hint: Allow players to be able to drop their own choices into this advancement.
allowDrops.label: Allow Drops

choices.hint: Specify how many choices are allowed at each level.
choices.label: Choices

level.hint: Only allow choices from spells of this level.
level.label: Spell Level

list.hint: Only allow spells from these lists.
list.label: Spell Lists

type.hint: Restrict what Item types can be chosen.
type.label: Item Type

MYTHICREALMS.ADVANCEMENT.Hint: Present the player with a choice of items (such as equipment, features, or spells) that they can choose for their character at one or more levels.
MYTHICREALMS.ADVANCEMENT.Title: Choose Items

Warning.InvalidType: Only {type} items can be selected for this choice.
Warning.MaxSelected: No additional items can be selected, uncheck items before selecting more.
Warning.NoOriginal: Previously selected choice no longer available for replacement.
Warning.SpellLevelAvailable: Only {level} or lower spells can be chosen for this advancement.
Warning.SpellLevelSpecific: Only {level} spells can be chosen for this advancement.
Warning.SpellList: Only spells available on the {lists} spell list can be chosen for this advancement.

ItemGrant.DropHint: Drop Items here to add them to the list granted by this advancement.

optional.hint: If the whole advancement is marked optional, players may opt out of any of the following items, otherwise all non-optional items are granted.
optional.label: Optional
